description: Endometrioid adenocarcinoma of the uterus, FIGO grade II, with less than 20% myometrial invasion, no lymphovascular invasion, and negative lymph nodes (pT1aN0M0) after total hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy with lymph node assessment.
patient_notes: Your report shows endometrial cancer that was confined to the inner lining of the uterus and removed completely by surgery. There was no spread to lymph nodes or other organs. Because the tumor was low risk, no additional treatment is needed at this time. We will follow you with routine check-ups to monitor your health.

verification.assessment: Staging and treatment recommendation are accurate for FIGO IA endometrioid adenocarcinoma.
